name: Seshin Hunters - by Akuno Studios
description:
Yōkai are a class of supernatural entities and spirits in Japanese folklore. Some may know them as cute and mischievous creatures only causing a little bit of trouble...but their true nature is much darker.

In Seshin Hunters, you are one of the few brave souls who take the battle against these monstrous spirits head-on. Receive your missions from the village elders and investigate the surrounding forest. Look for clues, talismans, and seal the yokai away to protect the people. 

Gameplay

Long ago, during the Edo period, Yugure Village was infamous for the attacks of the devious and cunning Yo-Kai surrounding the village. Then, a priestess sealed up all the Yo-Kai in the shrine, which did not exist then. After that, the village had peace for about 400 years. Until one day, the shrine mysteriously broke, releasing all the Yo-Kai from their rocky prison. Now, a famed paranormal investigator from the United States visits the village to try and end their Yo-kai threat once and for all…

Players will be venturing out into the biome beyond the village gates and completing tasks specific to each quest given to them. Some might be retrieval quests to craft items such as talismans to use to vanquish the Yo-Kai and others might be dealing with each Yo-Kai themselves.

There are Five Quests - Four Item Retrieval Missions and One Kappa Extermination Mission.
